analysis.description:
DistrictBuyer.withdraw (/unique_chucks/8/0x0f82c7eab8f7efb577a2de9d2b7e1da1d0b6870e.sol#61-96) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- contract_token_balance == 0

Reentrancy in DistrictBuyer.withdraw (/unique_chucks/8/0x0f82c7eab8f7efb577a2de9d2b7e1da1d0b6870e.sol#61-96):
	External calls:
	- contract_token_balance = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0f82c7eab8f7efb577a2de9d2b7e1da1d0b6870e.sol#74)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/8/0x0f82c7eab8f7efb577a2de9d2b7e1da1d0b6870e.sol#82-83)
	- contract_eth_value (/unique_chucks/8/0x0f82c7eab8f7efb577a2de9d2b7e1da1d0b6870e.sol#80)

DistrictBuyer.developer should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0x0f82c7eab8f7efb577a2de9d2b7e1da1d0b6870e.sol#38-40)
